details.text: Wrong Display Name 'alt-display' for http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0131#C. Valid display is one of 2 choices: 'Emergency Contact' or 'Ansprechpartner in Notf√§llen' (de) (for the language(s) 'en, de')
